title.narrative: Consultative Group for International Agricultural Research: Multilateral Projects Window 2

description.narrative: The Australian Centre for International Agricultural Research (ACIAR) contributes through Window 2 of the Consultative Group for International Agricultural Research (CGIAR) Fund Council, which enables funding of the ambitious CGIAR Research Programs (CRPs) that tackle the cross-cutting issues in agricultural research for development across the globe. The CRPs are crucial mechanisms of delivery due to the ever more complex issues facing agricultural research for development requiring an innovative approach to research. ACIAR recognizes no single research institution working alone can address the critically important issues of global climate change, agriculture, and food security and rural poverty, and investment into CRPs through Window 2 is critical in addressing these issues.

participating-org.narrative: Australia - Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
